response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its high value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $750,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
